mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.alias AS "alias", a.origin AS "origin", a.revision AS "revision", a.tags AS "tags", a.description AS "description", a.type AS "type", a.url AS "url", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM diy_guide_book a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.origin LIKE '%'||#{origin}||'%' '%'+#{origin}+'%' concat('%',#{origin},'%')
AND a.type = type
AND a.status = status
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diy_guide_book( id, name, alias, origin, revision, tags, description, type, url, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{alias}, #{origin}, #{revision}, #{tags}, #{description}, #{type}, #{url}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE diy_guide_book SET name = #{name}, alias = #{alias}, origin = #{origin}, revision = #{revision}, tags = #{tags}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, url = #{url}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
